title: 95/449/EC, Euratom, ECSC: Commission Decision of 2 October 1995 adjusting the weightings applicable from 1 November 1993 to the remuneration of officials of the European Communities serving in third countries
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 24 October 1995 on the list  of programmes of checks aimed at the prevention of zoonoses qualifying for a financial contribution  from the Community in 1996 (Text with EEA relevance) (95/469/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF  THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1.  The programmes listed in the Annex hereto shall qualify for a  financial contribution from the Community in 1996.
2.  For the programmes referred to in paragraph 1, the proposed rate and amount of the Community  financial contribution shall be as set out in the Annex.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 October 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
